title: On semi-simplicity of KMY algebras
abstract:
We study the algebras, $J_{l,n}(\delta)$, introduced by Kadar-Martin-Yu in
arXiv:1401.1774. We show that these algebras are iterated inflation algebras.
We give a set of generators for $J_{l,n}(\delta)$. We show that this algebra
satisifies the CMPX axiomatic framework in
  arXiv:math/0411395 when the base field is the complex numbers and $\delta \ne
0$. We show that $J_{l,n}(\delta)$ is semisimple over the complex numbers if
$\delta$ is complex and not real.
